author: Slidebean
description:
Flying cars are a “$9 trillion opportunity” according to a pitch deck

A recent article framed advanced air mobility as a multi-trillion-dollar opportunity based on long term economic impact projections.
While the technology is promising, the highlighted company has yet to deliver a commercial product, despite significant capital consumption and a multi billion dollar valuation.

These narratives aren’t uncommon in emerging tech:
large future markets are used to justify present-day speculation.
The opportunity may be real but often not for the reasons, or the timelines, being implied.

👉 Visit our YouTube channel for more content.
title: Why “$9 trillion markets” say more about storytelling than reality
